title: Me and my friend want to write the lyrics to a rap song but we dont really know how to go about it. Are there any tips that we can use? - Quora

response.answer_text: Absolutely. Nowadays, there are so many apps and sites that can definitely give you the tips you'll need to fulfill your passion or at least get you started. Below I've listed a few of my personal favorites when it comes to songwriting :  Rhymer- Your very own rhyming dictionary FREE Mobile Rhyming DictionarySmule- your gateway to the social experience of music, Smule - Connecting the world through musicYou can also get helpful apps from the play store ; check out AutoRap by Smule_an app which allows you to say a few words and it rearranges them into a rap song for you_really cool and pretty fun too Page on google.comAnother helpful tool i use is none other than a THESAURUS

1. Write two lines that ryhme2. Build a verse from those lines3. Write some clever lines3. Write a short rap 4. Rap the song to a beatI always wanted to rap, but i thought it was too hard. One day i decided to give it a try. It was easier than i thought it would be. I started writing short rap songs. If i were yall i would try to make every 2 lines ryhme. Spend some time writing clever lyrics. Pick a good beat ( get a app). Then rap it. Im taking my timeTrying to ryhme They say im coldBut im actually bold These are some example. I dont want to give alway my best lines. You can build your rap using these lines.
